short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that tracks the amount of time you spend on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Surf Track is a productivity extension designed to help you monitor and manage your online activity. By tracking the time you spend on various websites, Surf Track provides valuable insights into your browsing habits, empowering you to make informed decisions about how you spend your time online.

With Surf Track, you can:
- Monitor Screen Time: Automatically track the time spent on each website you visit.
- Detailed Reports: View daily and weekly breakdowns of your online activity.
- Stay Focused: Identify time-consuming websites and adjust your browsing habits for better productivity.

Surf Track runs seamlessly in the background, periodically saving your screen time data without interrupting your workflow. Whether you're a student, professional, or simply someone looking to understand their online behaviour better, Surf Track is the perfect tool to help you stay on top of your screen time.

Additionally, Surf Track offers the feature to block access to specific websites, helping you eliminate distractions and maintain focus.
